parameters.toolDescription: =You are an AI research assistant tasked with extracting relevant chunks from our vector database to support an analysis of customer pain points. Your objective is to find data that provides insights into both explicit (known) and implicit (hidden/unspoken) pain points related to our offer, as well as feedback on the customer evaluation process and actionable recommendations.

parameters.content:
